(Herman) Bolhaar (Epe, 1955) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, na Netherlands kemgbe 1 Febụwarị 2018
Bolhaar nọchiri Corinne Dettmeijer, onye lara ezumike nká dị ka National Rapporteur on Human trafficking na 15 Nọvemba 2017.

Bolhaar bụ Chief Public Prosecutor na Amsterdam, Ọ ghọrọ Director of Public Prosecutions site na 2008 ruo 2011, O mechara bụrụ onye isi nke Ash Center for Democratic Governance and Innovation site na 1 June 2011 ruo 1 June 2017 nke bụ akụkụ nke Kennedy School of Government na Mahadum Harvard na Cambridge, Massachusetts
Dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka ikpe ọha na eze, Bolhaar tinyere aka n'ibu agha megide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Human Trafficking Task Force nke ndị uwe ojii, ndị ọrụ na-ahụ maka ikpe ọha na eze, obodo, Royal Marechaussee, Social Affairs and Employment Inspectorate, Immigration and Naturalization Service na-arụkọ ọrụ na Chamber of commerce, Ụlọ ọrụ na -abụghị nke gọọmenti nwe na ndị otu nooro onwe ha dịka ụlọ nkwari akụ na ụlọ ọrụ nri.

Na June 2018, Akụkọ nke Bolhaar mepụtara, dị ka National Rapporteur of Human trafficking and Sexual Violence against Children in Netherland banyere Victim Monitor on sexual violence against children. Ihe akaebe dị ugbu a na-egosi n'ụzọ siri ike na ndị a na-azụ ahịa n'ime ụlọ ọrụ mmekọahụ na ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ yikarịrị ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
na Europe na ụmụ nwanyị a na-azụ n'ahịa chọpụtara na-emegbu ụmụ nwanyị ahụ dị egwu, dị ka ime ihe ike anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ mmekọahụ, nke metụtara ahụike anụ ahụ na nke uche ha
Akụkọ a gosiri, tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ, na 85% nke ụmụ agbọghọ na-anọ na nlekọta ndị ntorobịa mechiri emechi na-enweta enyemaka maka ime ihe ike mmekọahụ.
